EmailTemplate.subject: Important Updates about the Suniva Case
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Suniva Trade Case Update
Dear {!Contact.Name},
As a valued BlueWave partner, we want to keep you up-to-date regarding issues related to the solar industry. Yesterday the Suniva Trade Case decision was announced, imposing a declining tariff on imported solar PV cells over the next four years starting February 7th, 2018. Please see details below:
Year 1 Year 2 Year 3 Year 4 Safeguard Tariff on Modules and Cells 30% 25% 20% 15% Cells Exempted from Tariff 2.5 GW 2.5 GW 2.5 GW 2.5 GW
We recognize the impact of this decision, and the implications it will have on the solar industry. Please see our official statement here.
While we are disappointed by this outcome, we intend to push forward with our industry partners and coordinate a response. If you would like to get involved, please contact Mark Sylvia.
Our commitment to the solar industry prevails and so does our vision of making solar available for everyone, everywhere.
For more information on the impacts of this tariff, please see the following resources:
http://thehill.com/policy/energy-environment/370171-trump-imposes-30-tariffs-on-solar-panel-imports https://www.greentechmedia.com/articles/read/itc-solar-trade-case-recommendations#gs.GeX69A0 https://www.usitc.gov/publications/safeguards/pub4739-vol_i.pdf https://ustr.gov/sites/default/files/files/Press/fs/201%20Cases%20Fact%20Sheet.pdf
Feel free to contact us with any questions you may have, and for the latest updates, please follow us on social media using the links below. Thank you for you partnership, - All of us here at BlueWave
(888) 817-2703 partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
